definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun referring to James Comey, an American lawyer and former director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI), known for his role in high-profile political investigations.
definitions.explanation_cn: 专有名词，指美国律师、前联邦调查局（FBI）局长詹姆斯·科米，因参与多项重大政治调查而广为人知。
definitions.example_en: James Comey's testimony before Congress sparked widespread public debate.
definitions.example_cn: 詹姆斯·科米在国会的证词引发了广泛的公众讨论。
